back_text: Deck Size: 30. Trait Choice: At deck creation, choose either Spirit, Talent or both traits. Deckbuilding Options: Seeker cards ([seeker]) level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5, cards of the chosen trait level 0-2 (level 0 if you have chosen both traits, instead). Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): Black Hanekawa, Kako, 1 random basic weakness.
name: Tsubasa Hanekawa
text:
[reaction] After 1 or more horror is placed on Tsubasa Hanekawa, take 1 horror: Discover 1 clue at your location. (Limit once per round.)
[elder_sign] effect: +2. You may eihter take 1 direct horror, heal 1 horror or ready Black Hanekawa.

back_text: Deck Size: 30. Trait Choice: At deck creation, choose 2 out of 3 traits: Cursed, Trick or Tactic. Deckbuilding Options: Rogue cards ([rogue]) level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5, up to 10 other cards of the chosen traits level 0-2. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): Monkey Paw, Valhalla Combo, The Rainy Devil, 1 random basic weakness.

deck_options.name: Traits
deck_options.error: You cannot have more than 10 cards of the chosen traits.

name: Suruga Kanbaru
text:
Once per turn, you may evade an enemy not engaged with you at your location.
[reaction] After you succeed at a skill test by 2 or more: Place 1 resource on Monkey Paw, as a wish. (Limit once per phase.)
[elder_sign] effect: +2. Place 1 resource on Monkey Paw, as a wish.

name: Black Hanekawa
text: Permanent. Tsubasa Hanekawa deck only. While Tsubasa Hanekawa has 3 or fewer remaining sanity, Black Hanekawa gains: “Switch the base values of your [intellect] and [combat]. Switch the base values of your [willpower] and [agility]. [reaction] After you deal damage to an enemy by an attack, exhaust Black Hanekawa: Energy Drain. Either deal 1 additional damage or heal 1 horror.”

name: Kako
text:
While Kako is in your hand, you cannot trigger [reaction] abilities.
X is your remaining sanity.
Remove Kako from the game.

name: Monkey Paw
text:
Permanent. Suruga Kanbaru deck only. Limit 10 wishes on Monkey Paw.
[reaction] After your turn begins, spend 3 wishes: Choose one of the following - Draw 2 cards, gain 3 resources or take an additional action during your turn.

name: Valhalla Combo
text:
Suruga Kanbaru deck only.
Play only during your turn.
Test [agility](0). For each point you succeed by, gain 1 resource, to a maximum of X resources. X is the number of wishes on Monkey Paw.

name: The Rainy Devil
text: Revelation - If there are no wishes on Monkey Paw, shuffle The Rainy Devil back into your deck. Otherwise, for each wish on Monkey Paw, take 1 damage or 1 horror.
